titleStmt.title: The case of John Forster, respondent to the petition of appeal of Henry Forster, which seeks to reverse a decree of dismission made in Chancery the last day of May last; and to affirm a decree made in 1674 against the said John Forster (he being then an infant of seven years of age) unless cause shewn when he came of age.
titleStmt.author: Forster, Henry.
Forster, John, b. 1666 or 7.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
